I have a small stacked (2-3 minutes worth of image time) image of M42 taken from my backyard. Scope Nexstar 6SE using a Canon Rebel EOS T6.

No I haven't 

Tubm is excited for starship

I have revived this thread

I am not. (OPINION FOLLOWS) I think SpaceX is polluting LEO with satellites that are going to spend far more time over empty ocean or areas that wont benefit from what they offer.

tubm enjoys a good old fashioned comfort session with a purring kitty on their laps.

225104152023

I have a dog 

Tubm has over 30 ksp mods 

Sup

Yes 240 mods to be exact

TUBM Has Enjoyed Ksp-2

Never played it 

TUBM has got EVE volumetrics

My potato is too bad for EVE. 

TUBM is now on a plane.

Nope Currently on the ground

TUBM Hates SpaceX

No. Instead, I LOVE it.

(Successfully landed!)

TUBM had an bad flight experience.

In ksp? Not really. Irl? Yes. I was flying a model aircraft and suffered a control failure resulting in loss of aircraft. The worst I have ever experienced in commercial aviation was on TWA on the oldest 727 they had which iirc was also one of if not the oldest 727 of its type in service, but, we were heading towards the cruise stage of flight when the anti-ice system failed. It failed in a way that vented smoke into the cabin. So the pilot flying lowered our cruise altitude to a point where the anti-ice system could be shut down and we i think continued the flight safely. 
 

tubm is a licensed rc model pilot.

173404282023

I am not.

TUBM enjoys a nice walk around town.

It failed in a way that vented smoke into the cabin. So the pilot flying lowered our cruise altitude to a point where the anti-ice system could be shut down and we i think continued the flight safely. 

Aww man that was bad.
